name: Totally Spies! 2 Undercover
description:
After a successful first foray into video games, Totally Spies! returns in the second installment for the fans of the series. Players again control the three secret agents from the TV show: Sam, Alex, and Clover. The characters are sent on top secret missions and match wits and muscle against international villains all over the world.

Features

  • Play as all three main characters both as a team and individually
  • Enjoy a wide variety of game-play styles with action, puzzles, driving, sneaking, computer hacking and more
  • Features gadgets, villains, and characters form the hit TV show

Please check back for more information on this game as the release date approaches.
